contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|kern}} '''Kern''' may refer to: * [[Kern (surname)]], a surname * [[Kern (typography)]], the process of adjusting the spacing between characters in a proportional font * [[Kern (soldier)]], a light infantry unit in Medieval Irish armies * [[Kern, California]], a former unincorporated community in Kern County, California * [[Kern County, California]], a county in the southern Central Valley of the U.S. state of California * [[Kern ag]], a German-based international language service company * [[Boron, California]] or Kern, California, a census-designated place (CDP) in Kern County, California, United States == See also == * [[Kirn (disambiguation)]] * [[Kernel (disambiguation)]] * [[Kerner]], a surname {{disambiguation}}
